property.name: fs.defaultFS
property.description: Default URI for all filesystem requests in Hadoop. Thus, for example, when requesting $ hdfs dfs -ls / will list the contents of the local filesystem instead of some HDFS system. For that, you would $ hdfs dfs -ls hdfs://localhost:50050 where localhost:50050 is set as dfs.namenode.rpc-address in the hdfs-site.xml config file of the NameNode. Another option is to set this fs.defaultFS paremeter with that hdfs address, but I find it a bit messy.
